HotelElement.Name: Real Intercontinental Costa Rica At Multiplaza Mall

Address.Address1: In Front of Multiplaza Shopping Center, Escazu

Description.Text: The REAL INTERCONTINENTAL COSTA RICA AT MULTIPLAZA MALL is a Tourist hotel. Located in Escazu area. Shopping is accessible by bus/taxi and the nightlife/restaurants are easily accessible by taxi or bus from the hotel.

Location The hotel is ideally located in San Jose, within the exclusive residential area of Escazu, across from the Multi Plaza Shopping and Entertainment Centre. It is just 8 km away from the centre of San José. San José is a fun place, where every modern luxury is available in a tropical environment. Guests will find links to the public transport network only 500 m from the hotel. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 372 accommodation units. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Amenities include currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Additional services include room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony completes the range of amenities available in most rooms. A safe and a minibar also feature. A fridge and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. Leisure options at the establishment include golf, a gym, table tennis, a spa, a sauna and a steam bath, or for a fee, massage treatments. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
